alert.note: Alert for Alger; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 10:58PM EST until December 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches with locally higher amounts. The heaviest snow amounts will be east of Munising. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. The heavier snow bands will develop near the lakeshore during the morning and slowly shift inland through the day. * WHERE...Alger, Luce and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
